de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes

Class EventBasedGatewayInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes.AbstractControlNodeInstance
      • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes.GatewayInstance
        • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.controlnodes.EventBasedGatewayInstance

  • public class EventBasedGatewayInstance
extends GatewayInstance
    Representation for event based gateways.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void enableControlFlow()
      Since event based gateways can not have data preconditions and the users should not start them themselves, their enabling results in the immediate termination
      boolean terminate()
      Terminating an EventBasedGatewayInstance will register all following event control nodes and save that they are alternative.
